* Polígono 2
```sql
POLYGON((-58.44 -34.637,-58.44 -34.580,-58.382 -34.580,-58.44 -34.637))
```

* Bounding Box 1
```sql
BBOX(the_geom, -58.488,-34.637,-58.382, -34.580)
```
